resources.string: So your volume is set to:
So we have your volume at the minimum:
So we have your volume set to the maximum:

Speed of Sound is currently disabled. Tap the box above to start, or go to Settings from the wrench above to customize your speed and volume. You can also tap the map to look at your last drive and the songs that were played.
Matching your volume to your speed
Speed of Sound is designed to keep your eyes on the road, not your phone. As such, don\'t attempt to change settings or use your phone while driving.
You should turn GPS on in Location Settings or this app won\'t work very well.
Enable Speed of Sound or customize in settings
Open your music player and start playing
Plug your phone into your car\'s stereo system
Start driving and enjoy automatic volumes
